SEARCH
Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Model.Fronts

Class GoldFront

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Model.Fronts.Front
SoftEng_2024.Model.Fronts.ResourceFront
SoftEng_2024.Model.Fronts.GoldFront
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GoldFront extends ResourceFront
Represents the front side of a gold card in the game.

Extends the ResourceFront class, adding additional properties: - scoreTypes: Specifies the type of scoring mechanism for the gold card. - requiredResources: An array of Angles representing the resources required by the gold card.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GoldFront

      public GoldFront(Angles[] frontAngles, int points, boolean[] covered, ScoreTypes scoreTypes, Angles[] requiredResources)
      Constructor to initialize a GoldFront object with specified front angles, points, covered status, score types, and required resources.
      Parameters:
      frontAngles - An array of Angles representing the angles or resources on the front side.
      points - The points awarded when the card with this front side is placed.
      covered - An array indicating which angles/resources are covered.
      scoreTypes - The ScoreTypes enum specifying the scoring mechanism for the gold card.
      requiredResources - An array of Angles representing the required resources for the gold card.

    • checkRequiredResources

      public boolean checkRequiredResources(int[] boardResources, Card played)
      Checks if the required resources for the gold card are available on the player's board. If the card is flipped, it returns true. Otherwise, it compares the required resources with the player's board resources.
      Overrides:
      checkRequiredResources in class ResourceFront
      Parameters:
      boardResources - An array of integers representing available resources on the board.
      played - The card being played.
      Returns:
      true if the required resources are available; false otherwise.

    • updateScoredPoints

      public int updateScoredPoints(int[] anglesCounter, int coveredAngles)
      Updates the scored points based on the placement of the gold card. Depending on the score type, calculates the points differently: - If scoreTypes is ANGLES, multiplies covered angles by points. - If scoreTypes is not STATIC, multiplies the count of specific angles by points. - If scoreTypes is STATIC, returns the points as is.
      Overrides:
      updateScoredPoints in class ResourceFront
      Parameters:
      anglesCounter - An array containing counts of angles/resources.
      coveredAngles - The number of covered angles/resources.
      Returns:
      The updated points scored by placing the gold card.
